Description: IATA code of the airline operating the flight
Unique identifier assigned to a specific flight
Local date of the flight's scheduled departure
IATA airport code of the scheduled departure airport (e.g., "JFK", "LAX")
IATA airport code of the scheduled arrival airport (e.g., "JFK", "LAX")
Unique identifier for the bag tag
Date the bag tag was issued
Type of bag (e.g., "Checked", "Transfer") *Hot transfer bags are transfer bags with a connection time of less than 30 minutes
